member.name: D3D12_VERSIONED_DEVICE_REMOVED_EXTENDED_DATA

summary.para: Represents versioned Device Removed Extended Data (DRED) data, so that debuggers and debugger extensions can access DRED data.

member.seealso: Use DRED to diagnose GPU faults

summary.para: A value, specifying a DRED version. This value determines which inner data member (of the union) is active.
A value, containing DRED version 1.0 data.
A value, containing DRED version 1.1 data.
